Spiked Shell.name: Spiked Shell
Spiked Shell.blurb: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.
Spiked Shell.description: Innate: Basic attacks deal 10 (+ 10% armor)  bonus magic damage, increased by 50% to 15 (+ 15% armor) bonus magic damage while  Defensive Ball Curl is active.

Powerball.name: Powerball
Powerball.blurb: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
Powerball.description: Active: Rammus tucks into a ball and begins to roll, channeling for up to 6 seconds, gaining 25% − 39.17% (based on level)  bonus movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level)  bonus movement speed.
Powerball.description2: Rammus stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy,  knocking back all nearby enemies 100 units over 0.75 seconds, dealing them magic damage, and  slowing them for 1 second.
Powerball.notes:
* Powerball will still hit nearby enemies (including minions) if Rammus is  ghosted.
 Powerball will trigger Mana Charge twice (upon activation and when ending it prematurely).

Defensive Ball Curl.name: Defensive Ball Curl
Defensive Ball Curl.blurb: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
Defensive Ball Curl.description: Active: Rammus drops into a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance, increasing  Spiked Shell's damage by 50%, and applying it to enemies whenever they use basic attacks against him. Rammus is  slowed by 30% for the duration.
Defensive Ball Curl.leveling:
Bonus Armor:30 (+ 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100% total armor)
Bonus Magic Resistance:10 (+ 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50% total magic resistance)
Defensive Ball Curl.description2: Defensive Ball Curl can be canceled instantly by reactivating the ability or by activating  Powerball.
Defensive Ball Curl.notes:
* Defensive Ball Curl will return damage from attacks and/or abilities that apply on-hit effects ( Mystic Shot) as well as from  Runaan's Hurricane's Wind's Fury (will not return damage from turrets,  H-28G Evolution Turret, or  Jack in the Box).
 The resistance scaling will factor from all other sources, including Defensive Ball Curl's flat bonus. This will recalculate over the duration.
 The  self-slow can be reduced by  slow resist.

Frenzying Taunt.name: Frenzying Taunt
Frenzying Taunt.blurb: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
Frenzying Taunt.description: Active: Rammus  taunts the target enemy, gaining  bonus attack speed for the duration.
Frenzying Taunt.description2: While  Powerball,  Defensive Ball Curl or  Tremors is active, the  bonus attack speed is refreshed.
Frenzying Taunt.notes: * Frenzying Taunt behaves like a  stun when cast right before Rammus enters  stasis.

Tremors.name: Tremors
Tremors.blurb: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
Tremors.description: Active: Rammus creates an earthquake around himself for 8 seconds,  slowing and dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies for the duration. Structures receive double damage.
Tremors.leveling:
Magic Damage Per Second:30 / 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 (+ 20% AP)Total Magic Damage:240 / 360 / 480 / 600 / 720 (+ 160% AP)
Structure Magic Damage Per Second:60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 40% AP)Structure Total Magic Damage:480 / 720 / 960 / 1200 / 1440 (+ 320% AP)
Tremors.description2: The  slow persists for 1.5 seconds and stacks up to 8 times.
Tremors.notes: * Tremors has no cast time and does not interrupt Rammus' previous orders.
